attributes.action: Review our electoral system, and replace it with the Single Transferable Vote
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In our current system, only 36% of those who voted in 2005, voted for our Labour government. However, they have over 50% of the seats in Parliament. This is grossly undemocratic and must be changed. I would ask the Prime Minister to put a Bill before Parliament to implement the Single Transferable Vote to be used in this country. This can lead to less MPs, who are more representative of the people, and their wishes

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
